name: Sundance Flying Club, Inc
about: Sundance Flying Club, located at Palo Alto Municipal Airport, is a premier destination for aviation training and aircraft rental. Founded on the principle of shared aviation interests, the club offers a friendly, professional, and affordable environment for both novice and experienced pilots. Our fleet ranges from primary trainers like the Cessna 150 to higher performance aircraft such as the Beech Baron, ensuring versatility for all training needs. We pride ourselves on maintaining clean, well-maintained airplanes, efficient online scheduling, and seamless insurance coverage. Our members enjoy great availability with no daily minimums, and we support foreign pilots in obtaining US credentials. With a focus on community and safety, Sundance Flying Club is the ideal place to achieve your aviation goals. Call us at +1 (650) 494-7768 to join our flying family.
